channel.title: Tibikra - Oldschool Pking with new graphic!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://sphotos-a.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-snc7/400028_518539504835371_1643663764_n.jpg[/img][/CENTER] [SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF8C00]Welcome to Tibikra[/COLOR][/SIZE] [QUOTE] Tibikra is a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike. [/QUOTE] [SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF8C00]Start playing now[/COLOR][/SIZE] You can play Tibikra, through our [URL=http://www.tibikra.net/webclient/][COLOR=#008080]web client[/COLOR][/URL].
[SIZE=5][COLOR=#008000]Some features:[/COLOR][/SIZE] * Extremely stable - no lag * Hosted on a DDoS protected server - online 24/7 * Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations * Challenging experience rate - not too fast or too slow * Several minigames, including Duel arena, Barrows (wild and safe), Tibikra God's war,Bounty hunter, Fight pits, Fight caves and pest control! * Working highscores on our website [SIZE=4][COLOR=#FF8C00]Skilling Tasks[/COLOR][/SIZE] [img]http://s23.postimage.org/ae2hcnnaj/skilling.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimage.org/v8etuhhnv/Item.png[/img][img]http://s23.postimage.org/hsrt51963/Shop.png[/img] [B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#A52A2A]Media:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [img]http://s18.postimage.org/icwk3jhxj/Dice.gif[/img] [IMG]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/Cbow.gif[/img] [IMG]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/Mining.gif[/img] [img]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/spirit.gif[/img] [IMG]http://s11.postimage.org/f0f54w0ox/Quick_Prayer.gif[/img] [img]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/autocasting.gif[/img][IMG]http://s9.postimage.org/sw6lz3ffx/Pick_Pocket.gif[/img] [img]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/shop.gif[/img] [IMG]http://s23.postimage.org/832hrywy3/Switch.gif[/img] [img]http://s23.postimage.org/vtn4ekimj/cape.png[/img] [img]http://s16.postimage.org/p83bvy19x/Event.png[/img] [IMG]http://s3.postimage.org/abiu5ym5d/frost_Drag.gif[/img] [img]http://s23.postimage.org/boku0zqyz/PITS2.png[/img] [img]http://s23.postimage.org/aaxsjfh3f/WIN.png[/img]
[B][CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR=#800000]Bounty Hunter[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][/B][SPOILER=BountyHunter] [IMG]http://sphotos-a.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/24426_521426537880001_1388108068_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-h.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/3802_521426701213318_1890149728_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-f.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/603057_521426591213329_554946263_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-g.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-prn1/71879_521426491213339_197961257_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-d.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/580689_521426641213324_1465081807_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-h.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/74952_521426454546676_674985035_n.jpg[/img][/SPOILER] [B][SIZE=5]You[COLOR=#FF0000]Tube[/COLOR][/SIZE]:[/B] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3krYLIGx-Jk]PK vid #1 Pinky Pkers [Tibikra.net RSPS] dds/gmaul/xbow combos - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m7WWm0u9fFI]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m7WWm0u9fFI[/URL] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VNR_iV6KbZg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VNR_iV6KbZg[/URL] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i22Wb1onLnA]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i22Wb1onLnA[/URL] [CENTER][URL=http://www.tibikra.net/webclient/][SIZE=6]Play[COLOR=#008080] tibikra[/COLOR] now[/SIZE][/URL] [URL=http://www.tibikra.net/][SIZE=6]Visit[COLOR=#008080] tibikra[/COLOR] website[/SIZE][/URL][/CENTER]

item.title: Tibikra - Oldschool Pking with new graphic!
item.dc:creator: @shapaklekas shapaklekas
item.description:
@shapaklekas wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]
[SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF8C00]Welcome to Tibikra[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Tibikra is a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.

[SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF8C00]Start playing now[/COLOR][/SIZE]
You can play Tibikra, through our [COLOR=#008080]web client[/COLOR].

[SIZE=5][COLOR=#008000]Some features:[/COLOR][/SIZE]

  • Extremely stable - no lag
  • Hosted on a DDoS protected server - online 24/7
  • Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations
  • Challenging experience rate - not too fast or too slow
  • Several minigames, including Duel arena, Barrows (wild and safe), Tibikra God’s war,Bounty hunter, Fight pits, Fight caves and pest control!
  • Working highscores on our website
    [SIZE=4][COLOR=#FF8C00]Skilling Tasks[/COLOR][/SIZE]

    [SIZE=4][COLOR=#A52A2A]Media:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
